## OnElementResizedOptions type

An optional configuration object for `onElementResized`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type OnElementResizedOptions = {
    boxModel?: 'borderBox' | 'contentBox';
    signal?: AbortSignal;
};
```
